### List of resources

*-Under construction-*

**scATAC-seq raw data** (fastq files) can be downloaded from GEO ([GSE163697](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE163697); also includes bigwig, and cistopic objects.

Fragments files per run [link](TO-DO)

**Accessibility and expression matrices**:

<details><summary>File format: .loom</summary>
The *loom files* contains both, the matrix and the cell annotation. Most of the files are also available for exploration and download in [SCope](http://scope.aertslab.org/#/Fly_Brain/).

To access the data you can use the [R](https://github.com/aertslab/SCopeLoomR) and [Python](TO-DO) packages. 
i.e. 
```
loom <- open_loom("AdultP72.loom")
atacMat <- get_dgem(loom)
```
</details>

- *scRNA-seq*

  - Adult: [Davie_Janssens_Koldere_et_al_2018_AdultBrain.loom](TO-DO) (XXX cells, XX genes)
  
  - Larva: [Ravenscroft_et_al_2019_LarvalBrain.loom](TO-DO) (XXX cells, XX genes)

- *scATAC-seq* 

  - *Adult* + 72APF: [cisTopic probabilities (AdultP72.loom)](TO-DO) (XX cells, XX regions); [Gene accessibility matrix (AdultP72_GAM.loom)](TO-DO) (XX cells, XX genes)
  
  - *Adult* + 72APF + 48 APF: [cisTopic probabilities (AdultP72P48.loom)](TO-DO) (XX cells, XX regions)
  
  - *Larva* to 12h APF: [cisTopic probabilities (L3P12.loom)](TO-DO) (XX cells, XX regions); [Gene accessibility (L3P12_GAM.loom)](TO-DO) (XX cells, XX genes)
  
  - *All* time points: [cisTopic probabilities (All_timepoints.loom)](TO-DO) (XX cells, XX regions); [Count matrix (FlyBrain_ATAC_countMatrix.loom)](TO-DO) (XXX cells, XX regions)
    
**Cell metadata** including cell-type assignment: [cellData.txt](TO-DO) (also included in loom files)

**Cell-type aggregated files, peaks, and enhancer-gene links** (also available for exploration in [UCSC Genome browser](TO-DO)):

- Cell type aggregates:
  - Adult cells: [bigwig/AdultCellTypes/](TO-DO) (bigWig/.bw); [bam/AdultCellTypes/](TO-DO)(.bam)
  - Early development (Larva - 12APF): [bigwig/EarlyDevelCellTypes/](TO-DO) (bigWig/.bw); [bam/EarlyDevelCellTypes/](TO-DO) (.bam)

- Links enhancer to gene: 
  - Positive: [bb/region2geneLinks_nonPos_ctx.bb](TO-DO); [region2geneLinks_nonPos.txt](TO-DO)
  - Negative: [bb/region2geneLinks_pos_ctx.bb](TO-DO)

- Peaks: 
  - Adult whole-brain aggregate: [brainPeaks.bed](TO-DO)
  - Adult cell types: [peaks/AdultCellTypes/](TO-DO) (.bed/)
  - Early development cell types(Larva - 12APF): [peak/EarlyDevelCellTypes/](TO-DO) (.bed)

- Other regions:

  - [ctxRegions.bed](TO-DO)

  - [enhancersTested.bed](TO-DO)


Other **analysis results** (data matrices available in the networks section):

- [DARs](TO-DO) (Differentially accessible regions for each cell type)

- [Motif enrichment](TO-DO)

- [TFs per cell type](TO-DO)

- [Regions per motif](TO-DO)

- [RNA markers](TO-DO)
